name: Light Bringer
text: The runes have long been a potent weapon for the gods, and few runes are as mighty as the twelve sigils of the sun. These runes embody concepts of hope, the coming dawn, protection, and endurance. You have studied them in hopes of mastering the divine magic they offer. Few can unlock these runes’ power, since they demand a heavy toll from those who study them. You spent hours staring into the sun, almost going blind in the process, to purge your mind of all shadow. Only in such a condition can a runepriest master these runes.

features.holyRadiance(11thLevel): As a minor action, you can shed bright light in a radius of up to 10 squares
features.invigoratingLight(11thLevel): You can spend an action point to enable one ally within 5 squares of you to take a standard action as a free action, instead of taking an extra action yourself
features.twelveRunesOfTheSun(11thLevel): Whenever you enter a new rune state, you can enter the rune state of the light bringer instead
features.undeniableLight(16thLevel): While you are in the rune state of the light bringer, allies within 3 squares of you can’t be blinded

flavorText: I carry the runes of light to the darkest places.
